body_html:
The optimize_for_inference script is now deprecated in favor of the Graph Transform Tool (though we should make that clearer in the documentation):
https://www.tensorflow.org/mobile/prepare_models

Closing this, since I don't believe the GTT approach has the same issue.

body:
The optimize_for_inference script is now deprecated in favor of the Graph Transform Tool (though we should make that clearer in the documentation):
https://www.tensorflow.org/mobile/prepare_models

Closing this, since I don't believe the GTT approach has the same issue.
